subject: Periodical review of land acquisition status with CALA and submission of report to NHAI HQ.
text: HRT4 7rzly TrTrrf sifua<u Thn Phona 91-11-25074100425074200 (13r 9art &x {NTA1f 4in6ty) TR Fax 01-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Hlghways) 5i-5 Q 6, #ver-10, Errr, T Rarh-110075 G-5 & 0, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delnl-110075 NHAI/ 11013/DGM (LA/Coord) 2013/FT84762 11.12.2013 To AJ ROs Sub: Periodical revlew of land   acqulsition status with CALA and submission of report to NHAI HQ It has been felt that the progress of land  acquisition in projects depends to a large extent on  Comnpetent Authority (LA} Howcver; as per Project Directors  extend necessary assistance to CALAs for NHAI   policy , achieving progress of work. There are issues like joint measurement survey, valuation of structures etc = for which suhstantial involvement both at the Jevel ol PIU and CALA is required: Also delays at tbe end of CALA is required to be pursued relentlessly for timely acquisition of land. Project Directors and other officers in PIU are therefore, required to be in constant touch with CALA for expediting land acquisition, 2 In connection with the above, it has been felt that fortnightly meetings at the level of PIU-CALA may help to iron out issues relating to LA and expedite land acquisition  Therefore, Project Dircctors may be instructed t6 hold fortnightly meetings with CALAS ad submit minutes of such meetings to NHAI HQ through the Regional Offices. 3 You are requested to issue directions accordingly to all PDs under your jurisdiction. Your faithfully (VKSharma) Chlef Genoral Manager (LA & Coord: | Copy forwarded for informatlon necessary action please to: Al PIUs ( PS to Al Membera MhAU 467mDate:
